tool_description: InfoGlobe API is a database of country data including country population, capital city, and official language(s)
name: InfoGlobe API
title: InfoGlobe API

api_list.name: Country Data
api_list.description: This endpoint will return the population, capital and official language(s) of the given country.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://infoglobe-api.p.rapidapi.com/countries/United Kingdom"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "infoglobe-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://infoglobe-api.p.rapidapi.com/countries/{country}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "infoglobe-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
